999580.name: Fantasy Grounds - Meanders Map Pack: Undervaults & Dragon Lairs (Map Pack)
999580.description:
Meanders Map Pack: Undervaults and Dragon Lairs

Featuring 24 new terrains from creatures high above to underground labyrinths far below, dungeons and catacombs take as many varied forms as the lairs of the many dragons. Pose them as individual challenges or lead players through them to the lairs via a large assortment of differently themed catacombs, prisons, dungeons, a castle and various sections of the Undervaults. From crystalline nightmarescapes that look out into another dimension to hazardous meanders through elemental labyrinths of fire, ice, spiders, slime and stone - this pack offers a huge assortment of dangerous dungeons to get lost in. Lead your players into the gold hoards of the great wyrms in the core four jungle, ice, forest and desert terrains with dragon occupation including touches of dragon eggs, dragmarks, and bloody mountains of skulls and carcasses from feasts past where your adventurers will need to overcome not just the large beasts you deem to inhabit here, but the challenges of the terrains themselves to claim the rich heaps of glittering gold. Bubbling swampy mud, frozen climes, close quarters, the advantage of foes elevation and hints of one or two smaller but no less dangerous wyrms somewhere on the loose...
Featuring 24 ready-to-go maps:
  • Four Dragon Lairs
  • Four Castle Dungeons
  • Three Ice Dungeons
  • An Ice Castle
  • Ice Caverns
  • Four Fire Dungeons
  • Five Underdark Undervaults
  • 2 Drow-Themed Maps
Maps are sized specially for FG at 1350x900 and under 500 kb each to help prevent slow-down during play. The maps are sized to perfectly fit a 50 or 60px grid that you can manually place over the top of the map using Fantasy Grounds. Join the maps in this module together with each other, with other modules in this series, use a single map or use a combination of Time-lapse, Role-play and/or the supplied weighted Random Roll Table to determine when maps are used and where adventurers end up next.
DM Convenience is the focus with several ways to access, use and choose the maps in this module. Use the VISUAL MAP SELECTION PANEL and pick your map from the thumbnails and yellow label by clicking on the pin. Or use the RANDOM ROLL TABLE - a d100 table to pick your destination at random Or open Images/Maps tab to bring up a list of the maps labelled with a heading in [CAPITALS] and a brief description of each map so that you can quickly identify different files in this module, maps from this module and identify this module from others even if you have other FG meander modules open.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
